name: FLOW STREAK, PULSE HALT
description:
“Neon high-rises, digital infrastructure, collapsed humanity. All of which is the least of your concerns as you buy yourself just a little more time in these target trials for your own simulated life. Confused? Well don’t ask so many questions, finish fast and keep trying for more time. And maybe you’ll get enough time for some answers…”

A first person, speed run, shooter game. A prototype for a idea of a game to which you get the best score by hitting check points to add time and shoot targets to stop the clock.
